Package Items

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Coin
    Coin Item that can be picked up by Mario and adds to the score on the Scoreboard
    ExtraLife
    Extra Life Item that can be picked up by Mario and gives him 1 more life
    Item
    Abstract Item class used to make coins extra lives,
